scripts.grammar-modelgen: node dist/cli/grammar.js modelgen -i src/languages/grammar/grammar.msbnf -r grammar > src/languages/grammar/new-model.ts
scripts.model-modelgen: node dist/cli/grammar.js modelgen -i src/languages/model/model.msbnf -r Model > src/languages/model/new-model.ts
scripts.sexpr-modelgen: node dist/cli/grammar.js modelgen -i src/languages/sexpr/sexpr.msbnf -r datum > src/languages/sexpr/model.ts
scripts.json-modelgen: node dist/cli/grammar.js modelgen -i src/languages/json/json.msbnf -r value > src/languages/json/model.ts
